response: Welcome to our Ola Scooter module. Our revolutionary design comes in 12 stunning colors, with a spacious boot and iconic headlamps. The scooter is packed with advanced technology, including a companion app, phone-free navigation, and eco mode for extended range. Our Move OS three features proximity unlock and advanced regenerative braking. The Ola Scooter offers three different modes for a personalized ride. With a top speed of 116 km/h and a range of 181 km, it's the best performance ever seen in a scooter. Our proprietary battery management system ensures optimum durability and performance. Charge on the go with our Ola Hyper charger. Experience the future of scooting with Ola.
